name: FEATURED ITEM: SailorMoonBoy!
description:
Features:

Custom Sailor Moon themed housing painted by newbanZo
Inverted Pink Backlight
Purple UV Power LED
Brand new white screen cover
Brand new hot pink D pad and A/B buttons
Custom Black Start/Select buttons

1/8" or Internal prosound installed for free upon request

name: 8BA Gameboy Keychains!
description: Acrylic Laser etched 8bitAesthetics custom keychains! Very high quality.

name: Custom Gameboy by 8bitAesthetics (DMG)
description:
MADE TO ORDER: This listing is for a pre-order. Due to holiday demand please allow up to 3 weeks for assembly prior to shipment. All orders placed after December 1st are not guaranteed to arrive by the 24th of December. 

This listing is for a custom original gameboy. Please email us at 8bitaesthetics@gmail.com prior to purchasing this item. Once we discuss exactly what you would like, you can go ahead and add this item to your cart and checkout. 

The base price of an 8bitAesthetics gameboy with a solid or two color paint job, backlight, new screen cover, prosound, and colored buttons is $89.99. Detailed custom paint jobs are priced on a case by case basis.

Make sure to check out the photo gallery for some ideas! We offer very elaborate designs and are open to ANY request you may have!


LED backlights are available in regular and inverted: Red, Blue, Pink, Green, Orange, Yellow, and White. 

Buttons are available in a large variety of colors. 

Please also make sure to check out all the items on the website (even the sold out items), we leave them up as "sold out" for you to get an idea of what customization options you have. 

More information is available upon request.

name: Frontlit Gameboy Color Custom
description:
MADE TO ORDER: This listing is for a pre-order. Please allow up to 3 weeks for assembly prior to shipment.

This listing is for a custom frontlit Gameboy Color. Please email us at 8bitaesthetics@gmail.com prior to purchasing this item. Once we discuss exactly what you would like, you can go ahead and add this item to your cart and checkout.

The base price of an 8bitAesthetics frontlit gameboy color with a solid or two color paint job, frontlight, new screen cover, prosound, and new buttons is $129.99. Detailed custom paint jobs are priced on a case by case basis.


Make sure to check out the photo gallery for some ideas! We offer very elaborate designs and are open to ANY request you may have!


Please also make sure to check out all the items on the website (even the sold out items), we leave them up as "sold out" for you to get an idea of what customization options you have.

More information is available upon request.

name: 8BA Custom Gameboy Pocket (MGB)
description:
MADE TO ORDER: This listing is for a pre-order. Please allow up to 3 weeks for assembly prior to shipment.

Please make sure to contact us via the contact link above and discuss your color/design choices options prior to purchasing this item. Pricing is for a solid or two-tone paint job, more elaborate design requests are priced on a case-by-case basis. 

Internal or 1/8" prosound installed for free upon request.

name: Custom NES Controllers
description: MADE TO ORDER: This listing is for a pre-order. Please allow 7-10 days for assembly prior to shipment. The photos included in this listing are all of previously completed projects that were designed together by 8bitAesthetics and our customers. If you have something specific in mind (color combination, design) that you would like or just a general idea, send an email to 8bitAesthetics@gmail.com or message us via the contact link above before your purchase so we can work together to get everything exactly how you want it. After that, head back to this page and purchase the appropriate item "tier" item. Custom NES controllers are priced on a case-by-case basis. NOTE: IF you are requesting a custom controller for Litt Up Customs DNA20 Mod please let us know in your email. Controllers ordered for this mod will ship directly to Litt Up Customs. Click Here to view the available pre-made controllers for this mod.

name: Custom NES Systems!
description:
This listing is for the custom NES of your dreams. Whether it be a solid color, two tone, splattered paint, two tone with a character hand painted, or a completely elaborate design only you can describe, this listing is for you. 

Prices start at $119.99 for a solid or two-tone paint job with two matching controllers. Pricing for more elaborate designs will be priced according to the request. 

Please make sure to contact us at 8bitAesthetics@gmail.com before your purchase any item in this listing so we can work together to get everything exactly how you want it. After that, head back to this page and purchase the appropriate item.

8bitAesthetics@gmail.com

name: Custom Xbox Controllers!
description:
Make sure to contact us at 8bitAesthetics@gmail.com before your purchase so we can work together to get everything exactly how you want it. After that, head back to this page and purchase the appropriate item.

Purchase a custom controller or send in your own xbox controller to be customized!

name: Custom Gameboy Shells by newbanZo
description:
NOTE: Due to the high demand in this category, please allow up to 3 weeks for your custom shell to be completed prior to shipment. 

This listing gives price ranges to add on a detailed custom painted design to your order. 

Items shown in the photos are painted by 8BA artist newbanZo. 

Because the pricing of your item is based on the detail of your request, we have have created different pricing tiers to simplify purchases.

Please send an email to 8bitAesthetics@gmail.com with your ideas and we will work together with you on the design. After that, head back to this listing and purchase the appropriate "tier" item.

description:

Welcome to the Ultimate Chiptune Starter Kit!

This listing includes one custom 8bitAesthetics sky blue/black original Gameboy, one matching fully refurbished belt clip rechargeable battery pack, and one new matching LSDJ cartridge.

Gameboy Features:
Custom sky blue/black housing (front black/back sky blue/black battery door)
Biverted white LED Backlight (super crisp display - see photos)
Blue power LED
Custom clear sky blue D pad
Black A/B buttons
Custom black Start/Select buttons
Black screen cover
1/8" prosound jack

Battery Pack Features:
Matching sky blue/black housing
Brand new batteries installed - 8 hours of power from only a 45 minute charge!
Belt clip for power on the go!

LSDJ cartridge is Brand New with sticker color matching the sky blue/black theme of this package.

Gameboy, battery pack, and LSDJ cartridge all work perfect.
